nodes.text: A power wrench was a type of wrench that could be used in the maintenance of vehicles. In 32 BBY, one of the podracer Ody Mandrell's DUM-series pit droid maintenance team was carrying a power wrench when Mandrell pulled in for a pit stop at the Mos Espa Grand Arena during the second lap of the Boonta Eve Classic race on the planet Tatooine.

The droid carrying the wrench approached Mandrell in the podracer's cockpit, but before the team could begin repairs, their colleague DUM-4 was sucked into one of the engines of Manderell's podracer, destroying the engine and preventing the racer from further participating in the race.

A power wrench first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. In the new Star Wars canon, the tool was first identified in the 2016 reference book Star Wars Character Encyclopedia: Updated and Expanded, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the power wrench first appeared in the 1976 novelization of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, which was written by Alan Dean Foster.
